#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int n,m;

//int getchar_unlocked()  {return getchar();}
inline void Read(int &x) {
	register int c= getchar_unlocked();
	x = 0;
	for(; ((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-'); c = getchar_unlocked());
	for(; c>47 && c<58 ; c = getchar_unlocked()) {
		x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;
	}
}

int main(){
	int t,i,j,k;char s[5];
	scanf("%d",&t);
	int *a=new int[t];
	int *sa=new int[26*26];
	int *sb=new int[26*26];
	for(i=0;i<2;i++){sa[i]=0;}
	for(i=0;i<t;i++){scanf("%s",&s); a[i]=26*(s[0]-'A')+(s[1]-'A'); sa[a[i]]++; }
	sb[0]=sa[0];
	for(i=1;i<676;i++){sb[i]=sb[i-1]+sa[i]; }
	for(Read(k);k;k--){
		Read(j);
		if(sb[a[j]]>=j){ if(a[j]>0 and sb[a[j]-1]>j)puts("YES"); else puts("NO");}
		else puts("YES"); 
	}
	return 0;
}
